menuItems.text: How to Get Up to $500 Back on Advertising
menuItems.response_text: Important Information About Domain Names and Yandex.Direct Promotions! Did you know that Yandex.Direct often runs promotions where you can get up to $500 for advertising? 💰 This is a great opportunity to save money and attract more clients! But there is one crucial BUT: if your website uses a third-level domain name, you won’t be able to participate in these promotions and may lose money. To avoid this, check your domain name. Using a second-level domain not only allows you to participate in promotions but also makes your website look more professional and trustworthy.
